0101010110101000 0000001011101101 1 -> sum: 0101100010010110, cout: 0
1110011111011110 1000111001001011 0 -> sum: 0111011000101001, cout: 1
1100110000101010 1000100011001100 0 -> sum: 0101010011110110, cout: 1
1111111110000100 0011010100101010 0 -> sum: 0011010010101110, cout: 1
0010101010101011 1000011000110101 0 -> sum: 1011000011100000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
